attributes.action: Have a full public inquiry into grooming gangs.
attributes.additional_details: The grooming scandal is a national disgrace and must be fully investigated
attributes.background: A full transparent government inquiry overseen by at least 3 high court judges with all details published.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign the following petition:
 
Launch a Public Inquiry into Grooming Gangs
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/711976
